title:
Higher rank Nichols algebras of diagonal type with finite arithmetic
  root systems in positive characteristic
authors: C. Yuan, C. Qian, J. Wang
abstract:
The classification of finite dimensional Nichols algebras of diagonal type
plays an important role in the classification of Hopf algebras by the lifting
method of N. Andruskiewitsch and H.-J. Schneider over fields of characteristic
zero. In this paper, we obtain the classification theorem of all
finite-dimensional rank 5, rank 6 and rank 7 Nichols algebras of diagonal type
over fields of positive characteristic. Weyl groupoids and finite arithmetic
root systems are crucial tools to the classification theorem.
